title: Remove a market from Omen Verified Market
description: Someone requested to remove a market from Omen Verified Market

descriptions: Select this if you think the market does not comply with the required criteria and should be removed.
Select this if you think the market complies with the required criteria and should not be removed.

question: Does the market comply with the required criteria?

metadata.tcrDescription: Safe Omen markets which are unlikely to be considered invalid and are not tricky

columns.label: Market URL
columns.description: Link to the Omen market in the form https://omen.eth.link/#/MARKET_ADDRESS
